about_the_game:
Embark on a strategic journey through the turn-based world of TurnSkull. Each level presents a challenge filled with items to pick up and dangerous creatures you must defeat to open the exit and escape.

Discover an array of powerful cards scattered throughout the dungeon. Number cards augment your attack and/or defense depending on which slots they are in. Other cards offer enhancements such as increased movement speed, an impenetrable shield or a missile weapon to name a few. Carefully plan your moves as the order of cards in your inventory slots can determine their functionality.

With over 100 meticulously-designed levels, prepare to engage in brain-teasing puzzles that allow you to unleash your strategic prowess. Did you make a mistake? Simply undo any number of moves and try again. Every victory brings you one step closer to conquering the entire world of TurnSkull.

Uncover scraps of history scattered across the land to learn what happened. The castle in TurnSkull valley should be empty, but it is not. Uncover key clues by solving logic puzzles to unlock critical information about the unknown intruder and how he might be defeated.

The challenge doesn't end there. Experience the thrill of replayability as you strive for perfection, aiming to find optimal solutions and unlock hidden achievements. Return to the overworld map after each level to select your next conquest amidst a variety of locked and unlocked challenges.

Key Features


  • Strategic puzzle-solving adventure with challenging levels and immersive gameplay mechanics.
  • Dynamic 4-slot, card-based inventory system that augments attack/defense and grants other abilities.
  • 100+ hand-crafted levels, each offering a number of solutions.
  • Replayability with hidden achievements and optimal solution hunting.
  • Prepare to test your wit and emerge victorious in TurnSkull. Unleash your strategic might, conquer all levels, defeat the unknown intruder, and become the master of TurnSkull.
